availability.p: Published under a Creative Commons Attribution ShareAlike 3.0 License

div.head: Description of changes for 2011.10
div.p: This is the first public version of this text. It is a first draft created from a comparison of the vatican and reims transcription. Transcriptions of the Sorbonne and St. Victor text have been added. A provision critical apparatus has been, reflecting variants of reims and vatican manuscripts. Corrections and additions will be made after a comparision with the Sorbonne and St. Victor transcriptions. Difficult transcriptions have been marked as unclear; name and title elements have been give reference attributes pointing to their canonical instance. Image coordinates have been embedded in the source document of each corresponding manuscript transcription. Citations and cross-references still need to be added"
